messages.message: <!here> We’ve having platform issues again which is affecting customer demos, a few of us are blocked until this is resolved. Please could someone take a look at prod ASAP?
Taking a look -- can you help me understand what you mean by 'platform issues' since that's quite broad? What pieces are having issues?
I am seeing issue with file uploads timing out
Hari - just had 504 on a customer demo
can you share the URL?
https://instabase.com/apps/flow/edit/anils401/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/SimpleFlow/workflow.ibflow - FlowEditor for example doesn't open
FileSystem itself is opening fine
I’m unable to load any files in explorer,
@Hari can you share the URL for the 504 error you were getting
I also can’t get refiner to open.
https://instabase.com/solutions/hari/credit-agreements/fs/Instabase%20Drive/credits-agreement-ui/
refiner didn't work either during the demo :flushed:

I believe all these issues are linked to the grpc file service instability. I've temporarily scaled this up 10->20 pods as we continue to look into it. Please let me know if you continue to face issues.
Still facing issues at the moment. I can only open directories which seem to have been cached.
I’m not able to open this. https://www.instabase.com/SA_team/demo_new/fs/Instabase%20Drive/Docs/Motor%20Invoices%20Demo/

There might be a cascaded effect here
1) calls to fileservice are failing in api-server 2021-06-29 10:20:42.637 EDT[2021-06-29 14:20:42,636] {/instabase-api-server/py/instabase/utils/grpc/client.py:65} ERROR - Retrying b'/file_service.FileService/Stat' request in 1.5s due to StatusCode DEADLINE_EXCEEDED, Error (4, 'deadline exceeded'), Message Deadline Exceeded. Retries left 0
2) api-server keeps retrying leading to it not being to accept new work
[2021-06-29 14:14:23] "GET /api/v1/drives/mayuk.bairagya/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/Bootcamp/Excercise%201%20Solution/prog/refiner.ibrefiner HTTP/1.0" 200 391 183.026735 - some requests taking 3 minutes to finish!
@Anil @Lee @Hari can you grant me access to those workspaces? username: achao
@achao the issue is resolved now - I think most files weren't opening during that one hour

from private chat
https://instabase.com/apps/flow/edit/anils401/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/SimpleFlow/workflow.ibflow - when i tried to load this it makes a call to api/v1/drive - which is in api-server
that is the only call pending - all other calls complete
there are also logs in api-server where you see rpc failure
fyi <!subteam^S01DXHX6FPT>
